full_summary:
# Senior Instructional Design and Development Services Consultant Tender

## Tender Details
* **Tender Number**: W7809A124043
* **Publication Date**: August 17, 2023
* **Close Date**: August 30, 2023 @ 14:00 EST
* **Contract Start Date**: Expected September 15, 2023
* **Contract End Date**: Expected March 31, 2024

## Procurement Type
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
* **Solicitation Method**: Request for Proposal
* **Tender Status**: Expired (Closed)

## Scope of Work
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a Senior Instructional Design and Development Services Consultant for a period of ninety (90) days. The consultant will provide expertise in instructional design and development services, specifically in the following streams:

* Stream 2: Instructional design and development services

## Selection Criteria
The selection criteria will be based on variations or combinations of the methods outlined in the tender document.

## Eligibility
The tender is open to Learning Services Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60ZH-2100LS Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region.

## Required Qualifications
* One (1) Senior Instructional Design and Development Services Consultant

## Security Clearance
No security clearance is required for this tender.

## Document Safeguarding
No document safeguarding is required for this tender.

## Location
National Capital Region (NCR)

## Estimated Dollar Value
$0 - CKFTA

## Interested Parties
The following Learning Services SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Algonquin College of Applied Arts and Technology
* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
* Calian Ltd.
* Deloitte Inc.
* Ernst & Young LLP
* Graybridge International Consulting Inc.
* Instrux Media Corp.
* Kenneth Anderson
* Metrix Group Inc.
* Pentext Technical Communications Inc.
* RaceRocks 3D Inc.
* SEASONOVA Group Inc.
* The Willis Business College Limited
* Valcom Consulting group Inc.
* Valency Inc.

## Contact Information
For any inquiries regarding this tender, please contact:

* Viktoria Melnichuk
* Email: [viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca](mailto:viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 302-153
